name: Bean Royale
description: This game is just a dumb idea that has somehow became my life's work. You play as a mutated humanoid bean eliminating other mutated humanoid beans and shoot weapons that use beans as bullets. This game will eventually become multiplayer but it's no where close getting to that point yet. Myself (Mayan) and my friend (ShxShlix) just work on this game when we're bored. My friend mostly does the modeling things since I haven't had the time to do so. I mostly do everything else. If you want to learn more about who's done what then click on the "CREDITS" tab on the title screen.
